name: Robo-Recycle
description:
Details:

This game was made for Trijam #194

This game was made in 3 hours.

Theme: Recycling is essential Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Click to shoot
Goal:

In this game, your goal is to destroy the robots. After every wave, the robots' scraps are recycled into health and speed points. Good luck and Survive :)
